ValidationRule.description: SDT 33101, QuoteOnly should be readonly for Product Configured,Cost Configured,Price Configured
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED( Quote_Only__c ), OR(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, "Product Configured"),ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, "Cost Configured"),ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c, "Price Configured")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quote only can not be changed in below statuses - Procure Service, Configure Price, Submit for approval
